title: 2yo Jia tells grandmother she sweeped floor

content.question: Two-year-old Jia tells her grandmother that she “sweeped” the floor yesterday. The scenario illustrates that children

choices.label: cannot learn grammatical rules during the first two years of life
learn language primarily through operant conditioning
will model only words used by adults in their environment
overgeneralize the use of grammatical rules

content.answer: overgeneralize the use of grammatical rules

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
